Scare Package

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt7521214

Classificação: 5.4

Sinopse: Lonely horror aficionado Chad Buckley spends his days at his struggling genre video store arguing with his only regular customer, Sam. When an unsuspecting applicant shows up, Chad starts to teach him about the rules of horror and his video store at large, much to Sam's chagrin. During Chad's on-boarding process, we weave in and out of different hilarious horror shorts, each one geared at a different set of horror tropes. As this new applicant learns the ropes, he begins to suspect Chad of something sinister, but we quickly learn that he might well have his own secret.—yusufpiskin
